verify

Class ModelChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • verify.ModelChecker

  • public class ModelChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    ModelChecker is the interface between the preference reasoner in Java and the model checker tool that runs on the OS shell. Provides two methods for verifying models given in the input language of SMV. One method accepts and verifies an smvFile that contains the model as well as the property to be verified, and returns a file containing the raw output generated by the model checker. The other method accepts the smvFile containing the model and a separate specFile containing the list of specs to be verified for the model, and returns a file containing the formatted (true/false) list of verification results for the specs
    Author:
    gsanthan

      Uses the OS shell command to invoke a model checking tool to verify the model and spec(s) given in the smvFile using the variable ordering listed in voFile.

      Uses the OS shell command to invoke a model checking tool to verify the model given in the smvFile against each spec in specFile using the variable ordering listed in voFile Note: The variable ordering file is optional (may be specified as null if none is used)

    • Method Detail

      • invokeModelChecker

        public java.lang.String invokeModelChecker(java.lang.String command,
                                  java.lang.String smvFileName,
                                  java.lang.String specFileName,
                                  java.lang.String voFile)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Uses the OS shell command to invoke a model checking tool to verify the model given in the smvFile against each spec in specFile using the variable ordering listed in voFile Note: The variable ordering file is optional (may be specified as null if none is used)
        Parameters:
        command - Actual command line (corresponding to the model checker) to be invoked from the OS shell
        smvFileName - File to be model-checked for the specifications given in specFileName
        specFileName - File containing a list of temporal specifications to be verified
        voFile - Optional variable ordering file (for custom variable ordering)
        Returns:
        Name of the file that stores the summary list of verification results for specifications given in specFileName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • invokeModelChecker

        public java.lang.String invokeModelChecker(java.lang.String command,
                                  java.lang.String smvFile,
                                  java.lang.String voFile)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Uses the OS shell command to invoke a model checking tool to verify the model and spec(s) given in the smvFile using the variable ordering listed in voFile. Returns the name of the file that stores the raw (console) output generated by the model checker when the model and spec(s) in smvFile are verified. Note: Variable ordering file is optional (may be specified as null if none is used) Note: If multiple specs are within the smvFile, then the outputFile may contain the results of verifying all the specs as formatted by the model checker
        Parameters:
        command - Actual command line (corresponding to the model checker) to be invoked from the OS shell
        smvFile - File to be model-checked for the specification given in the same file
        voFile - Optional variable ordering file (for custom variable ordering)
        Returns:
        Name of the file that stores the raw (console) output generated by the model checker when the model and spec(s) in smvFile are verified
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • prepareSMVFilesForVerification

        public java.lang.String[] prepareSMVFilesForVerification(java.lang.String smvFile,
                                                java.lang.String specFile,
                                                boolean AGstyleSpec)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Prepares multiple specs for verification against the model in smvFile. Makes a copy of the original smv file for each spec in specFile; then adds the spec to this copy; and finally saves the list of smv files with the individual specs included. Returns an array of SMV file names containing the saved models with individual specs.
        Parameters:
        smvFile - File to be model-checked for the specifications given in specFileName
        specFile - File containing a list of temporal specifications to be verified
        AGstyleSpec - Whether the property is specified as an AG property (used for smv2qbf)
        Returns:
        Array of SMV file names containing the saved models with individual specs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • formatNuSMVOutputFiles

        public java.lang.String formatNuSMVOutputFiles(java.lang.String[] outputFileNames)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the verification results (true/false) from the raw outputs generated from multiple verification runs. Verification results are enumerated and saved.
        Parameters:
        outputFileNames -
        Returns:
        Name of the file containing enumerated list of verification results extracted from outputFileNames
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
